text: Pursuant to Article III(i) of the Compact, the Commission shall file a copy of the Commission's bylaws and amendments to the bylaws with the Mayor of the District of Columbia.

chapter.text: Compact for Education of the Education Commission of the States.

heading.catch_text: Commission bylaws to be filed with Mayor.
